hooks.command: cat ~/.claude/projects/<YOUR_PROJECT_PATH>/memory/MEMORY.md 2>/dev/null && echo '---' && echo 'Memory re-injected after compact.'

FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .new_file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FILE" ]; then case "$FILE" in *.env|*.env.*|*credentials*|*.p8|*.pem) echo 'BLOCKED: attempt to modify sensitive file' >&2; exit 2;; esac; fi; exit 0
